Dos: • Sit straight and open the chest for proper strokes. • Lungs, diaphragm and stomach should move with each inhalation and exhalation. • Bhastrika pranayama should be performed after asana and nadishodhana pranayama .
Don'ts: • Do not go beyond the capacity. • Chest and shoulders should not move. • Donotpractice it in extremely hot conditions.
